# Check if which comes back with a path to a utility
check_which()
{
   for i in "$@"
   do
         if [ -z "$i" ];
               then
                     echo "Cannot reach the utility $i, is it in 
the $PATH or even installed?"
                      exit 1
               else
                      :
           fi
    done
